name: ST04_04.BIN
original:
<DIALOG2>That customer there
spends all his time<NEXT>staring at the
mirror and never
buys anything![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Look at me--am I
cool, or what?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>He's still looking
in the mirror...<NEXT>I'll probably never
be able to get rid
of him...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I can't believe
how good-looking
I am![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>They say you're
only as old as
you think you are...<NEXT>That's why I dress
up like this--to
keep looking young![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Can you believe it?
He hasn't left yet!<NEXT>I give up![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Uh-oh...
I'm so good-
looking,<NEXT>I don't want to
move or else I'll
mess up my outfit![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>My daughter tells
me I should buy some<NEXT>new clothes every
now and then,<NEXT>so's I can get
dressed up and
look nice, see?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>We're open for
business as usual!<NEXT>Well, we do have
one unusual person
here,<NEXT>but please pay no
attention to him![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I'm getting tired
from standing here
for so long...<NEXT>But boy, do I look
good![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I came to get a
present for
my boyfriend...<NEXT>We're getting
presents for each<NEXT>other for our
anniversary...<NEXT>I've got to find
something he'll
like...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I wonder if it's OK
for the Inspector<NEXT>to be here at a
time like this?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Would you look at
that? I'm so
beautiful!<NEXT>Huh? Loud noise?
I didn't hear
anything...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Don't get the wrong
idea...<NEXT>I'm not goofing off
or anything...<NEXT>Even a detective's
gotta look his
best, right?<NEXT>I've got to set a
good example for my
men, see?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>The inspector was
called back to the
station...<NEXT>Apparently, they
found an
underground city or<NEXT>something like
that...<NEXT>I hope nothing else
bad is going to
happen...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Maybe I'm not so
good-looking
after all...<NEXT>Whoops!
I shouldn't say
things like that--<NEXT>my mother told me
never to lie![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I just don't
understand<NEXT>what young people
today are thinking!<NEXT>But I suppose my
elders said the
same thing about me<NEXT>when I was young,
too...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I want to evacuate,
but I can't as long
as he's here...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I wonder if I
couldn't use my
good looks<NEXT>to somehow save
the city...?<NEXT>I bet I could
if I tried![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Take it easy, and
remember to watch
out for yourself![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8.[0x87]8[0x0].[0x87]8[0x0].[0x87]8[0x0]
Looks like there's
no one inside...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8rustle...rustle<NEXT>Looks like
someone's inside...<NEXT>Man's voice
"Oh no!
The zipper's stuck![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8It's a mirror--
But this man's
in the way![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]
